modName: Pull Mastery Hookshot or Grappling hook
summary:
This mod add new spell allows player to fire a spring-loaded chain with a hook or spearhead on the end.
It will will pull target towards player and make player Lift up to Target distant.
descriptionHtml:
Pull Mastery Hookshot or Grappling hook
Version: 2.02
Author: xzax
Date 14/12/2013
Magic - Spells & enchantments

sidras01 make some video review for my mod.
(starts at 2:47)
Thank you very much.
[youtube]jE-tUuWb9OU[/youtube]

Sorry, I am not good to use English but i will try to explain.

============
Description
============
This mod add new spell allows player to fire a spring-loaded chain with a hook or spearhead on the end.
It will will pull target towards player and make player Lift up to Target distant.

======
Detail
======
This mod add new spell allows player to shoot chain with spearhead on the end.
It will will pull target towards player and make player Lift up to Target distant.

==========
Spell list
==========
Attack Spell
==========
Chain Spear [Des] - Shoot chain with spearhead pull target towards the caster and deals some damage.
Rope Spear [Des] - Shoot rope with spearhead pull target towards the caster and deals some damage.
Fiery Reach [Des] - Shoot chain with spearhead pull target towards the caster and deals some fire damage.
Spider Web [Alt] - Shoot Spider web to pull target towards the caster make target paralyze for a while.
Chain Spear of Stunning [Des] - Shoot small chain with spearhead make target paralyze for a while and deals some damage.
Scorpion's spear [Des] - Shoot chain with spearhead pull target towards the caster and deals some damage.

Transport Spell
===============
Chain Grappling Hook [Alt] - Use chain with spearhead Lift up to Target distant.
Rope Grappling Hook [Alt] - Use rope with spearhead Lift up to Target distant.
Spider Web Grappling hook [Alt] - Use Spider Web Lift up to Target distant.

==================
** Walkthrough ***
==================
Look for dead tree hollow with mushroom near Riverwood.(Please see picture)
***Road from Helgen to River wood,After start game to river wood
***Video http://youtu.be/6KZMdC9lXoY

Search Burial Urn for Books.
Read books You will have spells.

Booklist/id
=======
Book of Chain [xx]000D64
Book of Spider Web [xx]011532
Book of Rope [xx]016B5C
Book of Dragon Knight [xx]032FA7
Book of Stunning Chain [xx]0324DE
Book of Chain Grappling Hook [xx]0237FA
Book of Rope Grappling Hook [xx]0237FC
Book of Spider Grappling hook [xx]01B6C2
Book of Scorpion [xx]03DBFD

[xx] is MOD id use N.M.M. or nay mod manager to check it.

***By unsure about copy right i remove the "Get Over Here" sound now.
But not remove Scorpion's spear.
If you like the sound make your own record and make it to wave file name "Get_Over_Here_.wav"
And place in ***(Steam Folder)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDataSoundfxXzaxFR
If you not have folder create it.

=====================
Known Issues and Bugs
=====================
It a trick to make it like chain,web pull target back.
This mod need new animation for the spell but i can't do that (sorry)
This spell can shoot pass through the Small Transparent collision layer(objects like a chain link fence).

Attack Spear Spell can destroy som spider web.
Attack Spear Spell can use to attack Chaurus Cocoon.
Attack Spear Spell can use to attack Exploding Spider Egg.
Attack Spear Spell can use to attack Oil Lanterns.
Attack Spear Spell can use to destroy Elemental Rune.

Attack Spear Spell can activate Kinetic Resonator.
Attack Spear Spell can use to open gates in Soul Cairn (shoot the glowing orbs).

Transport Spells may not look more like use Grappling Hook but i make it good as i can do.
All spells use stamina if not good i will remove it later.

Save!!!! before use Grappling Hook Spells. You have chance to die by fall from high place.
Grappling Hook is complete break the game.It make a shotcut for Transport to new place.
Backup Save!!!! before use in some quest. It make you pass some queat checkpoints and break the quest.

If spell no effect
===================
-This spells has range if traget out of range is no effect.
-Some thing block the target. this spells need clear shot.
Will not shoot pass closely another things. It will block. (like when use Bow and Cross bow)

=====================
The things can't pull
=====================
Big target like dragon,mammoth
Some Dwemer Automatons
Flying things
The things float
Dead body
Object

===================
The things can pull
===================
Normal enemies
People
Animal like chicken
Giants

*** More not test yet ****

==================
Manual installation
===================
1. Locate .zip, .rar, or .7z file
2. unzip it with any program of your choices (winrar, 7zip, etc)
3. Move files "PullMastry.esp" and "PullMastry.bsa" into Skyrim Data folder.
5. enable "PullMastry.esp" in the launcher or N.M.M.

=====================
Manual Uninstallation
=====================
1. Open the launcher
2. Uncheck "PullMastry.esp"
3. Delete PullMastry files in
XXX:SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimdata
("PullMastry.esp" and "PullMastry.bsa")
